intro.p: Consider the vector field \mathbf{F}(x,y) whose plot is shown below. Also depicted is a line integral from P to Q.

image.description: The vector field F(x,y), and line integral.

content.p: Without computing the line integral, use the vector field and the direction of the line integral (from P to Q) to estimate if the value of this integral is positive or negative.

outtro.p: The value of this line integral is {{intvalue}}.
